quadrillion

Class QCoordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • quadrillion.QCoordinate

  • public class QCoordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a simple integer two-tuple for the representation of 2D coordinates, for modelling purposes of Quadrillion.
    Version:
    20190316
    Author:
    Unsal Ozturk

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Provides an equality check for two-tuples. Returns true if and only if the individual dimensions are equal to one another. Returns false otherwise, or if the compared type is not a QCoordinate.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - The other QCoordinate.
        Returns:
        Equality of two QCoordinates.
